Works fine in Windows 7 64bit. Make sure to run it as administrator otherwise it can't access the library.

If you're using it as a VST in Ableton Live, you have to run Ableton as administrator also, EVEN if you have updated with the 1.64 pstch in the comments. 

Going to test it our for a few weeks and if I like it, I'll buy it. You should too!
